title: The ‘Red-Green Alliance’ | Guests: Ken Cuccinelli & Asra Nomani | 7/23/20
description:
Acting DHS Deputy Secretary Ken Cuccinelli came prepared to turn the media narrative about federal officers in Portland on its head. He also explains why China’s Houston consulate was so abruptly shut down. Lutheran pastor Rev. Mark J. Powell makes the case that God says “all lives mater” after a woman who said those words was killed. Glenn’s nine-year-old prediction is now fulfilled: Radicals, Islamists, communists, and anarchists are working together and using the Black Lives Matter movement to dismantle the West. Former Wall Street Journal reporter Asra Nomani exposes the virus of woke Islamism. Former teacher Justin Kucera was fired after tweeting “Trump is our president,” but Glenn believes he was actually convicted of courage.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
